attributes.action: support a general election keeping a no deal on the table
attributes.additional_details: 17,400000 voters want to leave considerably more than those who don,t
attributes.background: To get the UK out of the EU as was voted for by a democratic majority. And not to be kept in by the left wing opposition parties ganging up on the Government who were elected to carry out this process

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition about leaving the European Union without a deal:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254329

There's also a petition about having a general election, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
